story_text: Farmer Mark parked his car in the market and started selling jars of jam.
A little dog named Sparky barked happily as it ran around the park.
story_images: A farmer with a hat, standing next to a car filled with jars of jam at a market.
A small dog playfully barking and running around in a green park.

questions.question: What did Farmer Mark do after parking his car?
What is the name of the dog in the story?
